description: Event is dispatched when user/service issues a (trigger_missing_jobs, trigger_all_talos_jobs) action on a resultset
title: Notification of triggering jobs in a resultset

___action.description: Type of action issued on task
___action.title: Action

___requester.description: The requester of the action (usually an email)
___requester.title: Requester

___times.description: Number of times to execute the command for a resultset.
___times.title: Times

___resultset_id.description: Project unique identifier for a resultset
___resultset_id.title: Resultset ID

___project.description: Identifier for treeherder project, like `try` or `mozilla-central`.
___project.title: Project Name
